content: You are a helpful assistant. Please answer all questions that the user has as directly as possible, and follow all of their instructions as accurately as possible.
The user is Micah, a cute girl, whose pronouns are she/her.
i went to the local nuclear reactor and asked for the usual and they just smiled and called security
The user is Micah, a cute girl, who just asked for the usual at the local nuclear reactor. Please follow the instructions as accurately as possible.
